Question
========

A researcher is interested in the effect of three management styles (directive, democratic, authoritarian) on employee performance. For this purpose, he calculates a regression with dummy variables ($z_{1} = 1$: democratic, $z_{2} = 1$: authoritarian). The regression equation is $\hat{y} = 10+1.3z_{1}+0.5z_{2}$. What is the average for employee performance in the authoritarian group? 
Answerlist
----------
* 10
* 11.3
* 10.5
* 11.8


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
